background: StreamFlix, a European media streaming company, needs to automate their video processing infrastructure. They require a solution that can handle large video files, process metadata, and maintain processing state information. The system must be scalable and comply with EU media regulations for content tracking.
training_quality_justification: MODEL_RESPONSE provided working prototype but required 5 significant production enhancements: comprehensive monitoring/alerting infrastructure, advanced ECS configuration with DLQ and auto-scaling, enhanced dual-AZ networking, database backup/encryption configuration, and Kinesis enhanced metrics/encryption. Model demonstrated core service understanding but missed critical production patterns. CDKTF syntax error in capacity provider configuration (critical fix) shows learning opportunity. Excellent training value for production-readiness patterns.
author: mayanksethi-turing
